episode_event_general_wataru_shirona_01/:
I’m Lance, dragon master and Champion of the
Indigo League! I never refuse a challenge!

I’m Cynthia, Champion of the Sinnoh region.
It sounds like I have some interesting battles to
look forward to!

Right, then... Time for
our daily training session.

Seeking to be the greatest and most powerful
sounds like seeking perfection... But the truth is,
we always have room to grow and improve.

What should I do today...
research or battle?

Seeking to better myself is much more important
to me than being the strongest. And having fun
while battling is the most important of all!
